general.sign_in_detail: Connect your wallet to see your Voting Power

proposal_modal.title: New Proposal
proposal_modal.description_question: Ask a Yes/No Question to the Decentraland Community
proposal_modal.description_catalyst: Add a new Catalyst server to Decentraland
proposal_modal.description_poi: Add a new Point of Interest (POI) to the Decentraland Map
proposal_modal.description_ban: Add a NAME you consider offensive to be denied inside Decentraland. Once approved, the name will no longer be shown inside the client
proposal_modal.description_wrap: You don't have enough power to create a proposal.
proposal_modal.confirm_question: You are about to ask {question} to the Decentraland Community. Do you want to proceed?
proposal_modal.confirm_catalyst: You are about to propose {url} with owner {owner} to be added as a {catalyst}. Do you want to proceed?
proposal_modal.confirm_poi: You are about to propose {position} to be added as {poi} in the Decentraland Map. Do you want to proceed?
proposal_modal.confirm_ban: You are about to propose the NAME {name} to be denied inside the Decentraland Client. Want to proceed?

proposals_page.title: Proposals
proposals_page.empty: No proposals have been sent by community members yet.

proposal_detail_page.description_ban: This prevents the use of abusive or offensive names for avatars, thus contravening community guidelines.
proposal_detail_page.description_poi: This allows users to have their scene featured on the map in a ‘pin drop’ form, enabling other users to find and access their scene.
proposal_detail_page.description_catalyst: Servers on the Catalyst network are owned by community members and hold copies of all scenes deployed to Decentraland. They also handle the messaging and interactions between players. Adding a Catalyst server will mean the addition of a server to the decentralized Catalyst network that makes up the backend of Decentraland.
proposal_detail_page.waiting_execution_tooltip: You don't have permissions to perform this action.
proposal_detail_page.support_detail: Support is the relative percentage of tokens that are required to vote “Yes” for a proposal to be approved. For example, if “Support” is set to 50%, then more than 50% of the tokens used to vote on a proposal must vote “Yes” for it to pass.
proposal_detail_page.approval_detail: Minimum Approval is the percentage of the total token supply that is required to vote “Yes” on a proposal before it can be approved. For example, if the “Minimum Approval” is set to 20%, then more than 20% of the outstanding token supply must vote “Yes” on a proposal for it to pass.
proposal_detail_page.enact_detail: Anyone can now enact this vote to execute its action.
proposal_detail_page.voting_power_detail: This was your balance when the vote started (block {snapshotBlock, number} mined at {startDate, date})

unwrapping_modal.title: Unwrap MANA
unwrapping_modal.description: Enter the amount of MANA you would like to unwrap, this action will reduce your Voting Power.
unwrapping_modal.completed: Your transaction was sent successfully and is pending confirmation.
unwrapping_modal.label: Wrapped MANA
